name: King the Yellow Jumpy Kid - Jump from Land to Land
name_original: King the Yellow Jumpy Kid - Jump from Land to Land
description:
FREE and fun game!

Pole vault from land to land
Avoid those nasty birds
Do not jump on the bombs
Get an extra life from a parrot!

King the Yellow Jumpy Kid - Jump from Land to Land will require skills to reach new records and beat YOUR FRIENDS best scores!
